vocabulary.example: The rain fell unceasingly throughout the night.
The decision to legalize marijuana was controversial among the citizens.

vocabulary.definition: completely used up or worn out
vocabulary.example: After the marathon, she felt exhausted but accomplished.

vocabulary.definition: to make denser or more concentrated
vocabulary.example: The cold air caused the water vapor to condense into tiny droplets.

vocabulary.definition: failure to take proper care in doing something
vocabulary.example: The accident occurred due to the driver's negligence in checking the brakes.

vocabulary.definition: able to be predicted or anticipated
vocabulary.example: The consequences of the pandemic were foreseeable to some experts.
